Deprecated API

Deprecated Classes
org.apache.velocity.runtime.configuration.Configuration
          as of 1.1. Please use ExtendedProperties from the Jakarta Commons collections component. 
org.apache.velocity.test.ConfigurationTestCase
          Will be removed when Configuration class is removed 
 

Deprecated Methods
org.apache.velocity.app.HttpServletResponseWrap.encodeRedirectUrl(String)
            
org.apache.velocity.app.HttpServletResponseWrap.encodeUrl(String)
            
org.apache.velocity.app.Velocity.evaluate(Context, Writer, String, InputStream)
          Use Velocity.evaluate( Context context, Writer writer, String logTag, Reader reader ) 
org.apache.velocity.runtime.parser.ASCII_CharStream.getColumn()
            
org.apache.velocity.runtime.configuration.Configuration.getExtendedProperties()
          Do not use. For deprecation assistance only. 
org.apache.velocity.runtime.parser.ASCII_CharStream.getLine()
            
org.apache.velocity.app.HttpServletRequestWrap.getRealPath(String)
            
org.apache.velocity.runtime.resource.ResourceManager.getResource(String, int)
          Use ResourceManager.getResource(String resourceName, int resourceType, String encoding ) 
org.apache.velocity.servlet.VelocityServlet.handleRequest(Context)
          Use VelocityServlet.handleRequest( HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response, Context ctx ) 
org.apache.velocity.app.HttpServletRequestWrap.isRequestedSessionIdFromUrl()
            
org.apache.velocity.app.Velocity.setConfiguration(Configuration)
          Use Velocity.setExtendedProperties( ExtendedProperties ) 
org.apache.velocity.app.HttpServletResponseWrap.setStatus(int)
            
org.apache.velocity.app.HttpServletResponseWrap.setStatus(int, String)
